about_the_game: This DLC unlocks the 18+ Adult Content for "Real Estate Real Romance: San Francisco". In this DLC, expect to see lesbian sex scenes that include both images of lesbian women having sexual and romantic relations and a tasty tale telling of the action!

content_descriptors.notes: The 18+ patch unlocks scenes depicting sexual and intimate intercourse with graphic and story content.
